titleInfo.title: Description and mapping positions of BoeWGS1.0 contigs

mods.abstract: Belongs to the study 'A Partially Phase-separated Genome Sequence Assembly of the Vitis rootstock ‘Börner’ (_Vitis riparia_ x _Vitis cinerea_) and its Exploitation for Marker Development and Targeted Mapping' which contains additional information about this dataset.
